name: Project Blue Valley
description:
PROJECT BLUE VALLEY

UPDATE | NOTICE: Game still playable but Incomplete

"Project Blue Valley" has been permanently shutdown due to lack of devs, assets outsourcing, copyright issues and mainly lack of funds. This project is now open source for all to develop. Thanks to all the devs and a very special thanks to all the Alpha & Beta testers of the project. In the future, the game may be back again, until then its in the "Void"
❤️
